data.message:
I couldn't believe that @Eminem drew a line in the sand.
 I didn't realize I had to decide where to stand. 

  He doesn't want you as a fan, 
If you won't  surrender your opinion to the will of this uneducated man.

He places his hand held high in a fist,
 I get that he dont like whats going on and he's pissed.

If I like Trump, fuck me, I've got to go?
  Even though Ive followed you since The Eminem Show.

Well Im too old for rap now, but so are you
 So go back to being obsolete,  and  Fuck You too!

replies.message: you already decided didn't  you?

Wow that was really well said haha. Even tho Em drew the line between some of his fans i'm going to still support him. People say some pretty screwed up things when they're upset although it still kinda hurts.
He's a lyrical genius, this was a amateur spoof at best. However, I'm disappointed in him for jumping on the Trump bashing bandwagon to get his name back in the headlines.
Is this the dude from the movie 8 Mile?
Yes
Roscoe Bondsman Williams He lost his Mojo. 😞
But now he can pay all of those guys to stand behind him and agree with him.
Even though he's ironically going to benefit from that "rich people tax break" he's bitching about.
Roscoe Bondsman Williams I thought this was an ad for SNL,  but it was just rabbit spittin’ Pooh. 🤷🏼‍♂️
Roscoe that was badass 👏👏
https://m.facebook.com/BoycottTheNationalFootballLeague/photos/a.118083062245206.1073741828.105478086839037/126570244729821/?type=3&source=48
Aaaaaayyyyyyeeeee
https://twitter.com/BlackGirlNerds/status/917962452679225345
Too true
Em is a pos!

What is really disgusting to me is I voted for Trump & so did my sexy black man we both were democrats & got tired of identity politics being played we saw the light...But yet I have been called a racist just tired of all the fighting..What are we teaching our children both sides need to start a conversation & stop the Hate.. United together divided we fall
Well y'all were idiots then lol
Poor little snowflake got lost outside of his safespace? Lol gtfo no one cares about you bigots
Fuck yeah!

Marshalls just mad his fans grew up and havent paid attention to him since 2010. Hes also boxed himself in now. He cant joke about raping little boys and other things now that hes the Civil Rights icon of the week.
